tool_description: The Hotels API offers a way to locate hotels in Singapore. The API supports searching by name, city or postal code. The API returns the name of hotel, number of rooms, address, latitude and longitude of the hotel, and social media information. Responses can be JSON or XML formatted. Authentication is not required. Data is pulled from Singapore's Hotels Licensing Board.
name: Hotels in Singapore
title: Hotels in Singapore

api_list.name: Search by Postal Code
api_list.description: The "postalcode" parameter can be filtered by range, supported for double types. Search results for a particular region can be performed by adding two periods (..) in between the range values.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leejaew-hotels-in-singapore-v1.p.rapidapi.com/hotels?country={country}&address[postalcode]={double}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leejaew-hotels-in-singapore-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://leejaew-hotels-in-singapore-v1.p.rapidapi.com/hotels?country={country}&address[postalcode]={double}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search by Name
api_list.description: The "name" parameter supports partial filtering by adding an asterisk symbol (*) on both ends of the string being searched.

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Currently the API returns a list of hotels only in Singapore.

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Returns search result with hotels containing value of the name parameter.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://leejaew-hotels-in-singapore-v1.p.rapidapi.com/hotels?country=Singapore&name=*copthorne*"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leejaew-hotels-in-singapore-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://leejaew-hotels-in-singapore-v1.p.rapidapi.com/hotels?country={country}&name={name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "leejaew-hotels-in-singapore-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())
